entry.title: Speedy Trial
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around confirmed transaction signaling and its relation to miner signaling. The need for a voting mechanism arises, but it is feared that requiring on-chain transactions from 6 billion people in the same week would not be feasible. It is noted that miners are the only ones who can create soft fork compatibility, making their signal the only relevant one. In other words, people can fork themselves at any time using any voting mechanism they desire.
